code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import style from'./product.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=()=>{const initialValue={id:0,title:"",price:0,description:"",category:"",image:"",rating:{rate:0,count:0}};const[product,setProduct]=useState(initialValue);const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products/".concat(id)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProduct(data));},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style.productContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.title,className:style.productImage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style.productDetails,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Rating: ",product.rating.rate," (",product.rating.count," reviews)"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Price: $",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/#/fake-store",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Back"})})]})]});};export default Product;
